assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Scala, Inc. engages in IT/AI/IoT/DX, customer support, HR and education, EC, insurance, and incubation and investment business in Japan. It is involved in the planning and development of services; and proposal, introduction support, provision, and improvement of the existing SaaS/ASP services for promoting digital transformation (DX) for companies, local governments, government, and public sectors. The company also provides Trust DX, a hybrid platform for electronic contracts for real estate transactions; digital ID app (xID) linked to My Number Card to complete personal authentication; and customer support consulting services for issues associated with call center operations. In addition, it offers recruitment support services for new graduates, which are specialized for athletic and female students, as well as services for the planning and operation of related events comprising joint information sessions and career seminars; childcare and educational services; and services in the areas of sports school for children, the planning and management of sports events, and online sports education. Further, the company operates a reuse e-commerce site for buying and selling trading cards games (TCG), which also contains game walkthrough pages; and provides pet insurance comprising insurance for dogs and cats. Additionally, it engages in activities related to the investment discovery, and investments execution and engagement; and implements business development, and promotes work-style reform of companies and regional revitalization through workation. The company was formerly known as Fusion Partners Co. and changed its name to Scala, Inc. in December 2016. Scala, Inc. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
